General.Name: Guangdong No2 Hydropower Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong No.2 Hydropower Engineering Company, Ltd. engages in the engineering construction business in China. The company constructs water conservancy and hydropower facilities, municipal public works, highway engineering, electromechanical installation engineering, foundation engineering, housing, and rail transit. It also engages in the hydropower, wind power, solar power, and other power generation business; Fabrication and installation of steel structures; survey and design, construction, operation, and maintenance of supporting facilities; heat production and supply; mining investment; and energy planning, design, and consulting services. Guangdong No.2 Hydropower Engineering Company, Ltd. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
